trans-unit.source: Provides information about input from a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om inndata fra en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> til en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the RawStylusInput to get information about the input the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> receives when the user moves the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av RawStylusInput til å få informasjon om de den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>mottar når brukeren flytter pekepennen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Henter stylus punktene som innhentes fra pekepennen.

trans-unit.source: The stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Stylus punkt som innhentes fra pekepennen.

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to the application thread's corresponding stylus methods.
trans-unit.target: Abonnerer på programmet trådens tilsvarende stylus-metoder.

trans-unit.source: The pen's input is routed to an element's <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: Pennen er inndata er distribuert til et element <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>på penn-tråden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: Because accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: Fordi nøyaktige treff-testing ikke kan utføres på tråd penn, kan noen elementer fra tid til annen motta stylus inndataene ment for andre elementer.

trans-unit.source: If you need to be sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, call the NotifyWhenProcessed method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger at inndataene ble rutet riktig før du utfører en operasjon, kalle metoden NotifyWhenProcessed i-metoden på penn-tråden.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to call NotifyWhenProcessed to subscribe to the application thread's method.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hvor du kan ringe NotifyWhenProcessed til å abonnere på programmet trådens-metoden.

trans-unit.source: |Call NotifyWhenProcessed in this method|To subscribe to this method| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>|
trans-unit.target: | Kall NotifyWhenProcessed i denne metoden | Abonnere på denne metoden | |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>|</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal sendes til programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: Sets the stylus points that are passed to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Angir stylus punktene som er sendt til programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: Events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> set by SetStylusPoints by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hendelser som <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>og <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, får den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>angitt av SetStylusPoints ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>

trans-unit.source: The stylus points to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Stylus datapunkt skal sendes til programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current stylus device.
trans-unit.target: Henter identifikatoren for den gjeldende stylus enheten.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Henter identifikatoren for den gjeldende tavle-enheten.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Henter klokkeslettet inndataene fant sted.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Timestamp property is the value of the <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property at which the stylus event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen tidsstempel er verdien for den <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen hendelsen stylus oppstod under.</xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet inndataene fant sted.
